Name: Average time from Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE to Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' and activity 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION'

Name: Average time from Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION to Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION' and activity 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR'

Name: Average time from Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION to Request Payment
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION' and activity 'Request Payment'

Name: Total time for Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION in cases where Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER occurs
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION' and the end of case where activity 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER occurs

Name: Minimum time from Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION to Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR across all variants
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION' and activity 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR'

Name: Average time for Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION in cases leading to Payment Handled without Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION' and activity 'Payment Handled'

Name: Total resolution time of Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION in cases with Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION' and the end of case where activity 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER occurs

Name: Minimum time for Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION in cases without Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION and the end of the case

Name: Average time from Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION to Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION' and activity 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER'

Name: Total time from Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION to Payment Handled in the most frequent variant
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION' and activity 'Payment Handled'

Name: Average time from Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION to Declaration REJECTED by SUPERVISOR in variants where this path occurs
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION' and activity 'Declaration REJECTED by SUPERVISOR'

Name: Minimum resolution time of Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION in successful payment cases
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION' and activity 'Payment Handled'

Name: Average time from Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION to Declaration REJECTED by EMPLOYEE in variants where re-submission occurs
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION' and activity 'Declaration REJECTED by EMPLOYEE'

Name: Total time for Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION across all variants leading to Payment Handled
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION' and activity 'Payment Handled'

Name: Total time for Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION in cases exceeding two months from trip date to reimbursement claim
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' and activity 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION'
